verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Something special's happening, (Echo.)
Before our very eyes. (Echo.)
By the precious touch of Jesus, (Echo.)
It's the miracle of life. (Echo.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm seeing life and it's a miracle, it's a miracle.
It's better than I've ever seen before.
I'm seeing life and it's so beautiful,
So very beautiful in you and me.
O! Praise the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In the power of His love, (Echo.)
Jesus died for me, (Echo.)
That the heavenly Father above (Echo.)
Might give His life to me. (Echo.)
